0807.3341v2.title: Thermopower as a Probe of Non-Abelian Quasiparticle Statistics in Fractional Quantum Hall States
0807.3341v2.summary:
This paper has been superseded by a new preprint: Kun Yang and Bertrand I.
Halperin, arXiv:0901.1429.

0810.3967v1.title: Hyperbolic structures on closed spacelike manifolds
0810.3967v1.summary:
In this paper, we study the intrinsic mean curvature flow on certain closed
spacelike manifolds, and prove the existence of hyperbolic structures on them.

1709.04597v1.title: About the Cuntz Comparison for Non-simple C*-algebras
1709.04597v1.summary:
We study the Cuntz semigroup for non-simple $\text{C}^*$-algebras in this
paper. In particular, we use the extended Elliott invariant to characterize the
Cuntz comparison for $\text{C}^*$-algebras with the projection property which
have only one ideal.
